author: Staff Reporter
text:
An interactive workshop for cartoonists titled ‘A Live(LY) Chat’ will be held at Rajan Eye Care Hospital auditorium, T. Nagar, from 9 a.m. to 2 p.m. on 27 March.

Participants asked to send in a mail to artistworksho chn@gmail.com to register for it.

For details, contact Ph: 9884694708/9176914336.
title: Cartoonists’ workshop
